description: Detects remote RPC calls to read information about scheduled tasks Author: Sagie Dulce, Dekel Paz. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Remote Schedule Task Recon via ITaskSchedulerService
query: ((EventLog:"RPCFW" AND winlog.event_id:"3" AND InterfaceUuid:"86d35949\-83c9\-4044\-b424\-db363231fd0c") AND (NOT (OpNum:("1" OR "3" OR "4" OR "10" OR "11" OR "12" OR "13" OR "14" OR "15"))))
